issue.title: [CF 1459] Currency missing
issue.body:
Wakened Essence isn't being added for tracking.


> Posted by CurseForge user solitha | Imported from CurseForge issue #1459 | Raw

comments.body:
Looks like its there to me. Did you scroll down in the dropdown?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

OMG. I didn't... I thought all the newest stuff was on top. Now I see all that stuff down there! Thanks!


> Posted by CurseForge user solitha

Yeah, I realized when you posted this that that's pretty terrible behavior. I updated the currency list to have up-to-date groupings for all current currencies. All future, unknown currencies will now end up at the top of the list now instead of the bottom until I give them an explicit position.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Thanks. I love TMW's versatility. It's like, as close as you can get to making your own addons when you have no idea how to make an addon :)


> Posted by CurseForge user solitha
